title: Mehendi Glowup
description: Lime & Love Kali Lehenga Set: A cheerful burst of lime and blush. Playful, breezy, and made for all the twirls.
Kundan Jhumki Earrings: Classic sparkle that moves beautifully as you dance through the day.
Kundan Maangtikka: A hint of tradition that ties your Mehendi glow together.
Arm Cuff Bracelet: A modern twist that keeps your hands free and photo-ready for all the henna moments.
Embellished Mojaris: Comfort meets charm. Perfect for long hours of celebration and style.
Fresh Glam Makeup: Dewy skin, flushed cheeks, and a pop of pink lip. The ultimate Mehendi glow combo.
modelAlt: Model wearing the mehendi glowup outfit styled from the flat lay
